job_description: Dojo Senior Developer Join us as a Senior Software Developer on our Artificial Intelligence BU Dojo team to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve: As a Senior Software Developer with Dell, your primary responsibility will be to develop new technologies and create proof-of-concepts to advance Dell’s technology into the future. We are looking for technologists who are comfortable learning and adapting easily to meet the needs of our rapidly evolving business. One day we may be working on low level code, the next we may be prototyping new user interface design. As a part of the Dell Technologies Artificial Intelligence BU, we research and innovate on the future of technology in a high visibility, collaborative team. You will collaborate with product managers, leadership, engineers and data scientists, tech leads, strategy, and/or stakeholders to execute technology development using an agile, fast-fail mentality. By working on small cross functional teams and using pair programming, you will have the ability to work in all layers of the stack and collaborate constantly, continually growing your skills. You will: Work closely with other developers as part of a small cross-functional team as well as with Product Management and Leadership to make decisions and share your work Deliver insights, proof-of-concepts and products to test out new technology Rotate through different projects and technologies Essential Requirements: You have a solid understanding of programming logic and patterns You have the ability and open mindedness to quickly learn about new development methodologies and cutting-edge technologies such as generative AI You have strong communication skills and an ability to articulate and shape technical vision You have experience or interest in DevOps and Extreme Programming (XP) You have experience in two or more of the following languages: Go, Java, Ruby, JavaScript, C++, Bash, Python, C, or others Work/life balance is important to you Advanced English Desirable Requirements: Bachelor's degree, master or PhD's degree of software development, software architecture, or applied research. Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Application closing date: 9 February 2024 Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment.
